data.expected_result: Discord tells you the image has a resolution too high.
data.short_description: Pasting a low in size, VERY HIGH in resolution image will crash discord upon pasting it into chat with ctrl+v.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new image with the dimensions 15129 x 14280 - Fill it entirely with white so the size of the file is under 8MB- ctrl+a and ctrl+c in the image editor - ctrl+v in Discord chat.
